question: This country signs Memorandum of understanding (MoU) with CA Institute.
explanation: The CA Institute of India signed a memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nepal (ICAN). Nilesh Vikamsey, President, Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) and Prakash Jung Thapa, President--ICAN exchanged the MoU.
